65 void MmwDemo_hwaInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)

76 void MmwDemo_edmaInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
77 {
78  uint8_t edmaNumInstances, inst;
79  int32_t errorCode;
80 
81  edmaNumInstances = EDMA_getNumInstances();
82  for (inst = 0; inst < edmaNumInstances; inst++)
83  {
84  errorCode = EDMA_init(inst);
85  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
86  {
87  System_printf ("Debug: EDMA instance %d initialization returned error %d\n", errorCode);
88  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
89  return;
90  }
91  //System_printf ("Debug: EDMA instance %d has been initialized\n", inst);
92  }
93 
94  memset(&obj->EDMA_errorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_errorInfo));
95  memset(&obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo));
96 }
97 
105 void MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle, EDMA_errorInfo_t *errorInfo)
106 {
107  gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_errorInfo = *errorInfo;
108  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
109 }
110 
118 void MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle,
119  EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo_t *errorInfo)
120 {
121  gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo = *errorInfo;
122  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
123 }

130 void MmwDemo_hwaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj, SOC_Handle socHandle)
131 {
132  int32_t errCode;
133 
134  /* Open the HWA Instance */
135  obj->hwaHandle = HWA_open(0, socHandle, &errCode);
136  if (obj->hwaHandle == NULL)
137  {
138  System_printf("Error: Unable to open the HWA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
139  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
140  return;
141  }
142  //System_printf("Debug: HWA Instance %p has been opened successfully\n", obj->hwaHandle);
143 }
144 
150 void MmwDemo_hwaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
151 {
152  int32_t errCode;
153 
154  /* Close the HWA Instance */
155  errCode = HWA_close(obj->hwaHandle);
156  if (errCode != 0)
157  {
158  System_printf("Error: Unable to close the HWA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
159  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
160  return;
161  }
162  //System_printf("Debug: HWA Instance %p has been closed successfully\n", obj->hwaHandle);
163 }
164 
170 void MmwDemo_edmaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
171 {
172  int32_t errCode;
173  EDMA_instanceInfo_t edmaInstanceInfo;
174  EDMA_errorConfig_t errorConfig;
175  int32_t edmaCCIdx;
176 
177  for (edmaCCIdx = 0; edmaCCIdx < EDMA_NUM_CC; edmaCCIdx++)
178  {
179  obj->edmaHandle[edmaCCIdx] = EDMA_open(edmaCCIdx, &errCode, &edmaInstanceInfo);
180 
181  if (obj->edmaHandle[edmaCCIdx] == NULL)
182  {
183  System_printf("Error: Unable to open the EDMA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
184  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
185  return;
186  }
187  //System_printf("Debug: EDMA Instance %p has been opened successfully\n", obj->edmaHandle);
188 
189  errorConfig.isConfigAllEventQueues = true;
190  errorConfig.isConfigAllTransferControllers = true;
191  errorConfig.isEventQueueThresholdingEnabled = true;
192  errorConfig.eventQueueThreshold = EDMA_EVENT_QUEUE_THRESHOLD_MAX;
193  errorConfig.isEnableAllTransferControllerErrors = true;
194  errorConfig.callbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn;
195  errorConfig.transferControllerCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn;
196  if ((errCode = EDMA_configErrorMonitoring(obj->edmaHandle[edmaCCIdx], &errorConfig)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
197  {
198  //System_printf("Error: EDMA_configErrorMonitoring() failed with errorCode = %d\n", errCode);
199  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
200  return;
201  }
202  }
203 }
204 
210 void MmwDemo_edmaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
211 {
212  EDMA_close(obj->edmaHandle);
213 }
